citations.narrative:
The contingency plan has not been reviewed in over a year by the facility. Contingency plans must be in place and
reviewed annually to ensure it adequately addresses the criteria listed in paragraph (a) of this section. The plan must
provide for the humane handling, treatment, transportation, housing, and care of their animals in the event of an
emergency or disaster. Correct by 14 June 2024 by ensuring the written facility contingency plan is reviewed, along with
documentation of the review, at least annually to ensure that it is still relevant to the facility and animals.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.134(b) 
   
Contingency planning. 
The contingency plan has not been reviewed in over a year by the facility. Contingency plans must be in place and 
reviewed annually to ensure it adequately addresses the criteria listed in paragraph (a) of this section. The plan must 
provide for the humane handling, treatment, transportation, housing, and care of their animals in the event of an 
emergency or disaster. Correct by 14 June 2024 by ensuring the written facility contingency plan is reviewed, along with 
documentation of the review, at least annually to ensure that it is still relevant to the facility and animals. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
